name: FarmWiz
description:
The wizard has retired from his wizardly work and has decided to start farming. Unfortunately he accidentally brings all crops to life. Will you help him make his farm successful and tame all crops?

Made as a ludum dare 52 submission and now upgraded to version 1.2

<Patch 1.2>

  • - Lowered music volume
  • - Enemies now face the player
  • - Movement speed upgrade now also makes animation faster
  • - Cursor locked in game
  • - Added outline to moving art
  • - Added hit and miss particle effects
  • - Fixed art cutoff glitches
  • - Fixed accidental planting after combat ended
  • - Fixed enemy pathfinding in own field
  • - Tweaked ui to look better
